2164.subject: NURS
2164.course_title_long: Information Management for Nursing in Health Care
2164.descrlong:
Focuses on development/application of health information technology for nursing.  Students will investigate information technology that supports clinical practice, research, and education, addressing legal and ethical considerations of informatics. (Department of Nursing consent required.) 

[(Prereq: NURS 301 and NURS 302) and (Coreq: NURS 300)]
